underlying_goal: To use the newly created PDF comment extractor tool on a file.
primary_success: Claude successfully used the previously developed tool to extract 107 comments from a PDF, providing a clear summary and a preview of the structured Markdown output.
brief_summary: The user asked to extract comments from a PDF in the `data/` directory. Claude located the file, ran the extraction script, and reported the successful extraction of 107 comments, saving the output to a Markdown file. It also provided a summary of the results and a description of the output format.
